sourcesContent:
import {Item} from 'semantic-ui-react' function ArticleCard({article}){ const {title, section, byline, abstract, url} = article const capitalizedSection = (artricleSection) => { artricleSection[0].toUpperCase() + artricleSection.substring(1) } return (

{title}

{byline}

Section: {capitalizedSection(section)}

{abstract}

 View Article
) } export default ArticleCard
